quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Verifying the removal of the painting ensures the first part of the instruction is followed.
quality_check_questions.question: Has the painting on the wall been removed?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Confirming the addition of a digital display ensures the replacement aspect of the instruction is complete.
quality_check_questions.question: Has a digital display screen been added in place of the painting?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Ensuring the screen displays weather imagery confirms that the content displayed on the screen is correct.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the digital display screen show real-time weather imagery?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Checking the position ensures the new element fits seamlessly into the existing room layout.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the digital display screen positioned in the same location as the original painting?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Evaluating room composition ensures that the edit does not disrupt the overall aesthetic.
quality_check_questions.question: Has the overall composition and balance of the room been maintained after replacing the painting with the digital display screen?
